title: Properties of a planet orbiting a star

content.prompt:
A planet of mass m orbits a star of mass M, where m<<M. The orbit is circular, its radius is r, and its period is T. True statements about the planet’s orbit include which of the following?

I. The orbital speed equals 2πr / T

II. The gravitational force equals GMm / r2

III. If the orbital radius r were greater, T would also be greater.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
